"Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina & The Waves - This upbeat and energetic song would set the tone for a carefree and joyful life, filled with sunny days and good vibes.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - A powerful anthem that encourages self-empowerment and resilience, this song would play during moments of challenge and perseverance, reminding you to keep pushing forward.

"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles - A classic and uplifting song that evokes feelings of hope and renewal, this tune would play during times of transition and growth, signaling the start of a new chapter.

"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - A feel-good song that exudes positivity and happiness, this tune would play during moments of pure joy and contentment, reminding you to appreciate the little things in life.

"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - An intense and motivational song that encourages pushing beyond limits and striving for greatness, this song would play during moments of intense focus and determination, inspiring you to reach for your goals.
